text: <@UM13MM9EJ> Yes so we installed a theme and when we view a blogpost <http://rsandh-5142560.hs-sites.com/blog/insights/the-rsh-design-philosophy-and-process> if you go to related articles you'll see a post "Pavement Rehabilitation Makes the Most of Airportâ€™s Resources at John Glenn Columbus International" and you'll see it has a topic of Architecture but if you go to the post itself <http://rsandh-5142560.hs-sites.com/blog/insights/pavement-rehabilitation-makes-the-most-of-airports-resources-at-john-glenn-columbus-international> it doesn't have that topic.
